name: openvpn
description: 5 OpenVPN server and REST admin interface - community package
preInstallNotes: This version merges the openvpn and openvpn-admin 0.0.0-0.1 packages, please remove the openvpn-admin package if installed
postInstallNotes:
OpenVPN DCOS Service has been successfully installed!
See https://github.com/dcos-labs/dcos-openvpn on how to create users.
postUninstallNotes:
OpenVPN DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
See https://github.com/dcos-labs/dcos-openvpn on how to remove persisted state.
